channel.title: How do i make a npc talk
channel.description: how do i make a npc talk i know its in npchandler.java but what do i search and what do i put in please help

item.title: How do i make a npc talk
item.dc:creator: @dissarmed dissarmed
item.description:
@dissarmed wrote:

NPCHandler.java:2946: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2946: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2946: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2960: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2960: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2960: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2972: reached end of file while parsing
}→
^
7 errors
is what its saying and i put them in the right spot same as the other souce i use so what did i do wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 12:27:02 pm[/size][hr][quote=“dissarmed”]NPCHandler.java:2946: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2946: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2946: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2960: illegal start of expression
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2960: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2960: ‘;’ expected
public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:2972: reached end of file while parsing
}→
^
7 errors
is what its saying and i put them in the right spot same as the other souce i use so what did i do wrong?[/quote]}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) {
if (misc.random(30) == 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to the Beta!!”;
}
is how i got it set up[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 12:36:25 pm[/size][hr]dont worry i worked it out myself =)!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 01:42:02 pm[/size][hr]lock me

item.title: How do i make a npc talk
item.dc:creator: @dissarmed dissarmed
item.description:
@dissarmed wrote:

[quote=“jeddac, post:3, topic:296926”]Oh c’mon, you’ve asked this like 4 times and had 4 perfectly fine answers, coding isnt for you if you can’t use your initiative,

download allstar v2 if you don’t have it, search for “Welcome” inside Npchandler, then follow that code but change the IDs and message to your own, look at what it is added under and add that to yours too.[/quote]no i asked how do i make them say im online or im not online diffrent

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc talk

item.title: How do i make a npc talk
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

Oh c’mon, you’ve asked this like 4 times and had 4 perfectly fine answers, coding isnt for you if you can’t use your initiative,

download allstar v2 if you don’t have it, search for “Welcome” inside Npchandler, then follow that code but change the IDs and message to your own, look at what it is added under and add that to yours too.

Read full topic
